pages.text: Splinecart is a mod that lets you build rollercoasters with curvy rails.$(br)$(br)Start by placing some track ties; these are nodes that the tracks will connect to. The arrow on the track ties indicate the direction the track will move.$(br)$(br)Then, right click a track piece on the starting node, and then the ending node.

If you did it correctly, you should see a curvy track connecting the two track ties together.$(br)$(br)You can place a minecart on the track by placing it on a regular minecart rail, and pushing it onto the track.
The magnetic track's acceleration is controlled by the strength of a redstone signal.
